evidence.claim: DirectRx integrates with AWS cloud services for scalable solutions.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for patient data security.
DirectRx utilizes EDI X12 transaction sets for healthcare billing processes.
DirectRx supports FHIR standards for interoperable health information exchange.
The integration architecture involves real-time data streaming with Kafka.

icp.icp_reason: DirectRx engages with X12 transactions, indicating a strong fit for API automation in healthcare data exchange.
